data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 5 - Legends Pack Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
The good times are back! Relive the excitement of the past with the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

There are five legendary riders, including Jeremy McGrath, Ricky Johnson, Jeff Stanton, Kevin Windham, Jeff Ward and a track inspired by the historic Pontiac Silverdome 2002, where you can race back in time.
Buy it now!
data.about_the_game:
The good times are back! Relive the excitement of the past with the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

There are five legendary riders, including Jeremy McGrath, Ricky Johnson, Jeff Stanton, Kevin Windham, Jeff Ward and a track inspired by the historic Pontiac Silverdome 2002, where you can race back in time.
Buy it now!
data.short_description: Relive the excitement of the past with the riders and track contained in the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) or Vega 11 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 VRAM) or Radeon R9 390X (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
